origin.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton.de: The arrow shooting, click-clacking, music disc making undead that we all know and love.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/und: You're an undead. Be wary of Smites.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/car: Veggies ain't gonna cut it for the undead lifestyle.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/tas: You like your meat with a little extra flavor. Specifically the flavor of rot.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/fra: Your bones have grown a bit brittle after becoming undead. You have 2 less health.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/hun: Raw and rotten meat doesnt give you a tummy-ache! Mainly because you dont have a stomach.
power.bits-and-bones-origin.skeleton/bur: You're undead bud, and unless you got some spf 50 you're gonna burn in the sun.
